pasugiya kalaya purawata apa wisin sanwidhanathmaka ayurin meheya wu harthal, wirodhatha pelapali, ratha pelapali aadiya sandaha ek wu janathawa samanga ee jana balayama thawa duratath eekarashi karamin, api mewara palath palana mathiwaranaye di bandarawela nagara sabhawa saha pradeshiya sabhawa sandaha swadhina kandayamak widiyata ‘karamaya’ lakunin tharaga karanawa.
